Title: The Beverly Hillbillies
Writer: Paul Henning (television series), Lawrence Konner (story), Mark Rosenthal (story), Lawrence Konner (screenplay), Mark Rosenthal (screenplay), Jim Fisher (screenplay), Jim Staahl (screenplay)
Actors: Jim Varney, Diedrich Bader, Erika Eleniak, Cloris Leachman
Plot: A feature adaptation of the classic television show, when nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich when he finds black oil, and moves him and his kin to posh Beverly Hills.
